generalHelpPhrase.content: You are competing against your friend Ben. The game is played until 11 points. During each round, you will be playing one of 5 fun activities.

activityLastLetterHelpPhrase.content: In Last Letter, pay attention to the last letter of the word because to hit back, your word has to start with that letter. So if I say dog, you say goat or grass.

activityBamWhamHelpPhrase.content: In BAM WHAM, I'll say words that start with 'B' and you have to respond with the correct rhyming word that starts with 'W'. So if i say 'bomp', you say 'whomp'

activityAlphabetRaceHelpPhrase.content: In ALPHABET RACE, pay attention to the first letter of the word and then respond with a word that starts with the next letter in the alphabet. So if I say Lamp, you say Monkey because M comes after L.

activityRhymeMatchHelpPhrase.content: In RHYME MATCH we have to respond with a word that rhymes with the last word. So if I say hug, you say bug.

trySomethingElsePhrase.content: Would you like to try something else?

newActivityUnlockedPhrase.content: Congrats! You are now ready for a new activity called %activity%. Do you want to play it now?

selectActivityBetweenAllPhrase.content: Do you want to play Last Letter, Bam Wham or Something Else?

selectActivityBetweenOthersPhrase.content: Do you want to play Alphabet Race or Rhyme Match?
